rooms.name: Temple of the Dawn
rooms.description: A serene stone temple with stained glass windows that cast rainbow light across the marble floor. An altar draped in white cloth stands at the far end, and the air carries the faint scent of incense. Soft chanting echoes from somewhere within.

effects.message: The temple's aura soothes your wounds.
The divine sanctuary of the temple forbids violence here.

rooms.name: Tavern Cellar
rooms.description: A damp stone cellar beneath the tavern, lit by a single sputtering torch. Barrels of ale and crates of provisions line the walls. Cobwebs hang in every corner, and the air smells of old wood and stale beer. A rickety wooden ladder leads up to a heavy trapdoor in the ceiling, but it's latched shut from this side. An iron lever juts from the wall nearby.

interactables.label: Pull Lever
interactables.description: You heave the rusty iron lever. With a grinding clank, the trapdoor latch releases and the way up swings open.
